title: Previewing Fall Camps and Preseason Storylines
description:
Wendi Nix, Greg McElroy and Roman Harper discuss the biggest question marks in each Power 5 conference and debate ideal formats for the College Football Playoff and how to solve the biggest issues surrounding NIL. Plus, reaction to Brent Venables' comments regarding the state of college football recruiting.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew discusses some of the top preseason storylines from each conference
